  • Method Details

    • playCard

      public void playCard(@NotNull @NotNull String playerID, @NotNull @NotNull Integer cardID) throws IllegalApprenticeCardException, AlreadyPlayedCardException, OutOfBoundIntegerCardException
      Parameters:
      playerID - String that identifies a player
      cardID - Integer that identifies an ApprenticeCard
      Throws:
      IllegalApprenticeCardException - thrown when a player tries to play a card whose cardID is already been played in the same turn by another player, only i he has other options in hand to play
      AlreadyPlayedCardException - thrown if a players try to play a card already played, or tries to play two cards in a turn
      OutOfBoundIntegerCardException - thrown if cardID given is out o the cardID bound
